question: In which country, "Karpas Peninsula" is located?
explanation: Karpas Peninsula, also known as Karpasia, is an elongated peninsula and one of the most prominent geographical features of the island of Cyprus. It houses Cape Apostolos Andreas, the Golden Beach, Kantara Castle and Apostolos Andreas Monastery. It forms the nesting grounds for the loggerhead and green sea turtles and it is also home to Karpasian Donkeys.
